processingResourceMetaData.name: JCoRe Clinical Trials Reader
processingResourceMetaData.description: This component reads the XML format provided by ClinicalTrials.gov. To this end, the JCoRe type system contains a number of types specifically created for this kind of document. Note that the CAS text created by this reader might be confusing without checking the corresponding annotations. This is due to the fact that the CT XML contains multiple enumerations which are not very well reflected in plain text. Also, enumerations with subitems, such as the outcomes, are not displayed in the expected groups of items. Instead, each item type is displayed separately. This could be changed, if necessary. Since all items are correctly annotated by their category, this might not even be an issue, depending on the downstream tasks.

configurationParameter.name: InputDirectory
configurationParameter.description: The root directory that contains the clinical trials. The reader supports a subdirectory structure where the actual XML documents are located on deeper levels.

configurationParameter.name: FileNames
configurationParameter.description: For debugging: Restrict the documents read to the given document file names.
